rationale: SecureFile Compression (user) requires a license for Oracle Advanced Compression to use.
recommended_action: Do not use the "STORE AS SECUREFILE" with the "COMPRESS" option when creating a table with a LOB column.  Disable it after the fact with the "NOCOMPRESS" option to "ALTER TABLE ... STORE AS SECUREFILE"
error_message: SecureFile Compression (user) is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Advanced Compression
